document.discussion_title: Two dead after Lovington car wreck
document.topic_text: Two dead after Lovington car wreck 2016-04-25T17:57:02Z Two people are dead following a Saturday afternoon wreck in Lovington, New Mexico. The collision happened at the intersection of East Avenue D and Industrial Street. Both vehicles involved were pickup trucks. Joseph Wier, 25, and his wife Tymplaire Jodana Wier, 20, both of Lovington were pronounced dead at a hospital shortly after authorities responded to the scene. In the other truck were Oscar Martinez-Zamora, 19, and a 16-year-old male, also both of Lovington, who were airlifted to a Texas hospital. Martinez-Zamora and the 16-year-old are both expected to survive. Copyright 2016 KWES . All rights reserved. Can't Find Something? 11320 West County Rd. 127Midland, Texas, 79711
